arts.ttl: 'That's why I came back' - Matt Crooks delivers great response after epic Hull City win - Hull Live
arts.sum: Hull City goal hero Matt Crooks says night's like the Tigers' emphatic 3-0 win at Sheffield United is why he wanted to come back from the USA. Jacob went on to turn home the second City goal in front of a jubilant away following in the Steel City before Joao Pedro's determination forced Harrison Burrows to fumble in an own goal two minutes from time to cap a sensational away performance and one which left Crooks understandably delighted.

arts.ttl: Hull shock Sheff Utd to deny Blades top spot
arts.sum: Hull City denied Sheffield United the chance to reclaim top spot in the Championship with a shock 3-0 victory at Bramall Lane.

arts.ttl: Ruben Selles' verdict after Hull City's 'statement' win at Sheffield United
arts.sum: "We have been talking about getting the key moments of the game on our side, and then I think that's what we did today, sometimes when you play against a really good team like Sheffield United, if you come with the initiative of just being low and waiting for things to happen, you're not going to get anything so we showed that we can go and press them higher in the pitch, but they have qualities that sometimes break our press and then we need to become lower in the pitch to defend. We have been talking about that, and I expected my team to have character and play the game in the way that we wanted.

arts.ttl: Stunning Hull City romp to huge away win at Sheffield United as Championship feels impact
arts.sum: After a dominant start to the second half from the hosts, and City struggling to get a foothold in the contest, Selles made a double change with Matty Jacob replacing Burns and Matazo coming on for Crooks after 54 minutes. The visitors started brightly until the Blades had a flurry of three threatening corners inside six minutes, but from the third, City broke quickly through Gelhardt and then Kamara, whose ball into the box was prodded back into the path of on the on-rushing Crooks who ran on and guided a terrific strike into the top corner from the edge of the box to give City the lead.

arts.ttl: Hull rock Sheffield United with stunning 3-0 win at Bramall Lane
arts.sum: Matt Crooks and Matty Jacob scored before a late own goal.

arts.ttl: Official | Hull City sign Eliot Matazo from AS Monaco
arts.sum: Hull City FC have signed AS Monaco midfielder Eliot Matazo (22), both clubs have announced. The 22-year-old has put pen to paper over a three-and-a-half-year contract with the Tigers, who…

arts.ttl: Champions League midfielder joins Hull City as Tigers complete eye-catching transfer
arts.sum: Hull City have completed the eye-catching signing of Monaco midfielder Eliot Matazo on a three-and-a-half-year contract with the option for a further 12 months, in what is considered quite a coup for the Championship strugglers. Matazo, who has three Champions League appearances under his belt earlier this season including one against Arsenal at the Emirates Stadium, arrives on a contract until 2029 after City agreed a fee with the Ligue 1 club, thought to be in the region of £2m, which could rise to around £2.5m.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Tottenham watching Sheffield United first-teamer as they consider bid before deadline day
arts.sum: TBR Football understands that Ipswich Town have enquired about Sheffield United’s Scottish youth star Ryan One and could make a move for him this month,...

arts.ttl: Pundit makes Hull City relegation statement as Tigers face 18-game battle to survive
arts.sum: Former Wolves striker Don Goodman has backed Hull City to survive in the Championship season, despite the Tigers sitting in the bottom three after a dismal campaign. I think he was a stern guy with left-field methods and the players didn’t seem to be able to come to terms with it," Goodman told Casino.co.uk .

arts.ttl: Eliot Matazo absent from Monaco training ahead of impending Hull City transfer
arts.sum: Eliot Matazo (22) was absent from AS Monaco training on Friday ahead of his impending move to EFL Championship side Hull City. As previously reported by L’Équipe, Monaco have agreed a €2m…
